statements: SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT customer_id, name, purchase_history FROM customers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, address FROM customers WHERE customer_id > 2 AND customer_id < 5;
SELECT name, address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT customer_id, name, address FROM customers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE purchase_history IS NOT NULL;
SELECT DISTINCT address FROM customers ORDER BY address ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_data;
SELECT name, email, address FROM customer_data;
SELECT customer_id, name, phone_number, email FROM customer_data ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM purchase_history WHERE total_amount > 100;
SELECT purchase_id, purchase_date, total_amount FROM purchase_history ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_data WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT name, email FROM customer_data WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT customer_id, SUM(total_amount) AS total_spent FROM purchase_history GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY total_spent DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS purchase_count FROM purchase_history GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 3;
SELECT name, address, phone_number FROM customer_data WHERE email IS NOT NULL;

SELECT customer_id, name, purchase_history FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id WHERE orders.total_amount > 1000;

SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products ORDER BY unit_price DESC;

SELECT orders.order_id, products.product_name, order_details.quantity, order_details.total_price FROM orders JOIN order_details ON orders.order_id = order_details.order_id JOIN products ON order_details.product_id = products.product_id WHERE orders.customer_id = 3;
